title: macOS Mojave public beta is live – test drive the new Dark Mode today | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Apple macOS Mojave10.14]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * ## You can’t beat a bit o’ beta…This version of the desktop operating system comes hot on the heels of thefirst public iOS 12 beta release on June 25. It also follows the release ofthe second Mojave developer beta released last week.As always, Apple is advising eager users to express caution when downloadingthe beta software. The company recommends installing the software on asecondary machine rather than a primary device.If you insist upon installing the beta on your main Mac, make sure you make afull Time Machine back-up before doing so.**Have you tried Mojave yet? Is Dark Mode a game changer for yourproductivity? Drop us a line @TrustedReviews on Twitter.**
